rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with Kerala-style wooden panels and stone accents.
Spacious living area that opens to the garden via large glass doors; includes a traditional Kerala veranda.
Functional kitchen with modern amenities and traditional stone flooring, respecting Vastu by keeping it in the south-east corner.
Dining area adjacent to the living space, designed for social gatherings with natural lighting.
A guest room with a balcony overlooking the garden, in keeping with Vastu principles of privacy and serenity.
